feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: ics compat with older ical specced calendars by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19582
  • perf: do not import from @calcom/lib/server barrel file by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19579
  • feat: eleven labs app by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19585
  • fix: add flex-wrap to fix overflow by @scarlachs in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19584
  • fix: two items in one row in profile by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19602
  • perf: Do not import Stripe lib in getServerErrorFromUnknown by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19578
  • fix: updating attributes doesn't happen in real-time by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19604
  • fix: remove wrong conditions to fetch users on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19580
  • perf: Remove PlainChat from pages router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19588
  • fix: Valid timeslot marked 'slot no longer available' by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19590
  • perf: dynamically import sentry lib in error catch clause by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19607

New Contributors

  • @scarlachs made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19584

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.7...v5.0.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: v2 managed user attendee bookings by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19612
  • fix: added zoom, msTeams as valid locations in event-type, booker atoms by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19599
  • revert: country code by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19618
  • chore: migrate OG image generation API to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19568
  • fix: hubSpot doesn't work for paid team events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19609
  • chore: migrate /org and /team embed pages to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19148
  • fix: remove onboarding check for platform account creation by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19449
  • fix: Change the origin to WEBAPP_URL for routing from event redirect URL by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19593
  • chore: moved /help to github.com/calcom/help by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19554
  • chore: update platform docs for teams setup by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19619
  • feat: Task createCRMEvent can retry at cutomizable fixed interval by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19571
  • fix: update profile instead of username. Display p.username by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19621
  • fix: few ui issues by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19625
  • feat: plain-thread-tier by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19463

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.8...v5.0.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: App theme being used in routing-form embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19489
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19632
  • revert: v2 managed user attendee bookings by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19635
  • fix: useAtomGetEventTypes pathname by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19637
  • hotfix: Embed - Sometimes hidden mostly for acme.cal.local/team1 page by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19639
  • chore: replaced submit to continue by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19641
  • fix: 6 character hash suffix in the username for a member of an orga… by @utkarsh10000 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19633
  • fix: Dismiss toast on click by @nayan-bagale in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19650
  • feat: Organization Delegation Credentials (Google,Outlook) by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16622

New Contributors

  • @utkarsh10000 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19633

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.9...v5.0.10

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19654
  • fix: Re-instate new slot logic now it's A/B tested in production by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19605
  • refactor: Move @calcom/core to @calcom/lib by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19655
  • fix: verification input field by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19656
  • fix: Incorrect Attendee Shown When Cancelling a Seated Event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19647
  • fix: remove ‘add guests’ from the dropdown if it’s disabled in the booking questions by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19649
  • feat: added Ability to set organizer's default app as a valid input location in api/v2 by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19549
  • fix: show selected filter values first in single- & multi-select filters by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19620
  • fix: small mistake in Hungarian confirmation by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19665
  • fix: adjust table height on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19662
  • fix: Private links in orgs when profile username isnt cal.com username by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19667
  • chore: add hooks section to v2 docs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19651
  • refactor: import UseIsPlatform directly instead of barrel file by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19670
  • feat: booking redirect page url is now has uid in it's parameters by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19522
  • fix: UI on mobile by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19673
  • fix: use portal for DataTableSelectionBar by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19672
  • refactor: Move classNames from @calcom/lib to @calcom/ui by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19674
  • chore: add docs to /v2/organizations/:orgId/organizations endpoints by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19668
  • fix: some flaky e2e tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19648
  • fix: scheduleId to work on PATCH event type host assignment via api v1 by @Shpadoinkle in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19546
  • fix: allow cancelledBy query param to work on api v1 by @Shpadoinkle in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19268
  • chore: remove TRPC barrel exports by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19598
  • chore: early return for static assets in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19678
  • chore: TS config - ignore node_modules in subdirectories by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19680

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.10...v5.0.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: improve Intercom app by @vachmara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19687
  • fix: api v2 axiom logs exceed column size by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19636
  • chore: improve validate hosts api v2 team event-types by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19696
  • fix: member filter issue by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19707
  • chore: rename DWD to DelegationCredential by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19703
  • fix: incorrect locale value by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19692
  • feat: improved ooo search by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19704
  • fix: v2 managed user attendee bookings by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19716
  • chore: remove storybook by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19659
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19729
  • perf: dynamic import for Sentry CaptureException by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19730
  • fix: typos in packages directory by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19574
  • fix: auto submission upon uploading photo by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19715
  • fix: booking fields being overridden for team events in atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19702
  • chore: write defaultResponder for App Router APIs by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19727
  • fix: tab item is not translated by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19735
  • revert: "chore: rename DWD to DelegationCredential" by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19734
  • fix: search on team availiability (for non-org users) by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19738
  • feat: Updates to HitPay Payment App by @MuhammadAimanSulaiman in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19737
  • chore: Upgrade to node v20 as v18 is EOL next month by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19733
  • refactor: Typescript fixes and updates for bumping ts version to 5.8.2 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19690
  • perf: remove atoms monorepo imports by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19688
  • fix: open cal video url on new page when ready by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19683
  • chore: rename DWD to DelegationCredential by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19744
  • chore: Bump .nvmrc node version to node 20 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19760
  • fix: typos in apps/api by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19762
  • fix(payments): add return_url for Alipay PaymentIntent confirmation; fixes #19138 by @ShivanshKumar760 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19153
  • feat: make calcom UI dumb again by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19658
  • chore: Fix types of app-store to prevent type drilling by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19732
  • fix: hubspot not working for paid team events by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19761
  • fix: condition-for-incomplete-bookings-tab by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19720
  • fix: use impersonatedById by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19682
  • fix: plain z index by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19767
  • chore: Update CODEOWNERS to have @calcom/Foundation on Platform line items by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19769
  • fix: make strict bottom position of DateRangePicker optional by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19768
  • perf: Add CrmServiceMap by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19718
  • chore: [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities by @pumfleet in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19755
  • chore: Bump node to 20 in APIv2 Dockerfile by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19770

New Contributors

  • @ShivanshKumar760 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19153

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.11...v5.0.12
